title: E0623 misleading for this example

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Due to changes in #44079, the error message for the example is misleading. No data flow occurs here.

```
$ ./local-rustc src/test/compile-fail/regions-free-region-ordering-caller.rs
error[E0623]: lifetime mismatch
  --> src/test/compile-fail/regions-free-region-ordering-caller.rs:18:12
   |
17 | fn call2<'a, 'b>(a: &'a usize, b: &'b usize) {
   |                     ---------     ---------
   |                     |
   |                     these two types are declared with different lifetimes...
18 |     let z: Option<&'b &'a usize> = None;//~ ERROR E0623
   |            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ...but data from `a` flows into `b` here

error[E0623]: lifetime mismatch
  --> src/test/compile-fail/regions-free-region-ordering-caller.rs:23:12
   |
21 | fn call3<'a, 'b>(a: &'a usize, b: &'b usize) {
   |                     ---------     ---------
   |                     |
   |                     these two types are declared with different lifetimes...
22 |     let y: Paramd<'a> = Paramd { x: a };
23 |     let z: Option<&'b Paramd<'a>> = None;//~ ERROR E0623
   |            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ...but data from `a` flows into `b` here

error[E0623]: lifetime mismatch
  --> src/test/compile-fail/regions-free-region-ordering-caller.rs:27:12
   |
26 | fn call4<'a, 'b>(a: &'a usize, b: &'b usize) {
   |                     ---------     --------- these two types are declared with different lifetimes...
27 |     let z: Option<&'a &'b usize> = None;//~ ERROR E0623
   |            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ...but data from `b` flows into `a` here

error: aborting due to 3 previous errors
```

cc @nikomatsakis
